name: Pattern studies - Typographic patterns #3
description:
This work is part of study on generative, interactive and animated patterns which explores the relation between simplicity and complexity.
This is a grid of "P" drawn with the 'Tangerine' font, arranged in a radial way. To explore you can move the mouse vertically to change the complexity and horizontally to change the width of the pattern, click to re-scale the grid. Press any key to change the character used.
The font used is 'Tangerine' by Toshi Omagari available under the Open Font License at https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Tangerine?query=tangerin#about
